metadata.name: Lost
metadata.description:
A new road called NFTs opened up for me on January 11, 2021.  
I came here with no prior knowledge of the community, web3, blockchain, or cryptocurrencies. I initially believed it would be simple to sell my artwork here, but after a short while, I learned it is a whole new world of art enthusiasts. After that, I began to learn and interact with others, which was fascinating. I met several wonderful people who love art and collect art.  
I believe I have matured both as a person and as an artist over the past 365 days. 
Now NFTs are a part of my life, and I feel lost in this amazing universe.
